title: Internal Hackathon ENI 2022
content: This Saturday, March 19, 2022, the Co-founder and CEO of AKATA GOAVANA was invited to be part of the jury during the internal hackathon organized by the Association of Students of the National School of Computer Science - UF. Theme: Online registration and control of entrance exam results at ENI.

title: Computer Science Fair Edition
content: On the morning of March 11, the Computer Science Fair Edition 1 was held at ENI Tanambao Fianarantsoa, organized by AEENI.RAMIANDRISOA Andriamandranto Patrick (Bodge) engaged with students to share the mindset they should adopt when making life decisions, as these new students must decide the path they will take during their studies. He also addressed students' questions about the advantages of pursuing the software and database track, the academic path he followed, and why studying at ENI (National School of Computer Science) is advantageous. Students were encouraged to complete the projects assigned by teachers and to go above and beyond.He also emphasized that each individual is responsible for their own decisions, highlighting the importance of not solely relying on others but considering others' opinions as suggestions. Don't wait for others to answer your questions; you must conduct research on your own.

title: New Year's Wishes Ceremony
content: The New Year's wishes ceremony of the AKATA GOAVANA company took place this Saturday, February 19, at our headquarters. We cherish this moment of happiness and gratitude towards God, parents, and all team members. We learn from our mistakes from the previous year. This year, we challenge ourselves to go far, reach a higher level, exceed our limits, and achieve the best of ourselves. A new working method will be adopted to become greater than before. That's all we will accomplish this year.

title: Greetings from the AKATA GOAVANA team for the New Year 2022.
content: The AKATA GOAVANA team wishes you a Happy New Year 2022. We wish you the best—may this year be filled with love, dreams, and success. For AKATA GOAVANA, 2022 is a year full of opportunities to set new goals and achieve significant projects. We have 365 days to become even more GOAVANA, even in the face of the Covid-19 health crisis. Take care of yourself and your family. What do you have planned for this year?

title: Futurella Madagascar 301 office’s inauguration
content: Futurella Madagascar 301 office’s inauguration. This company is specialized in electronic product manufacturing, IT, robotics, automation, transport and farms. Honoring and collaborating with other organizations is one of our actions Futurella Madagascar 301 office’s inauguration. title: Summer School PV Fianara 2021
content: The Summer School PV Fianara 2021 is organized by the 'Francophone Employability Center',in collaboration with the University of Fianarantsoa and the FianaraLab Association. We were also a partner. Its objective is education on sustainable energy for Madagascar. Honoring and collaborating with other organizations are part of our actions.

title: Visit to Ranomafana National Park
content: Sharing positive energy and happiness among colleagues in a warm and pleasant environment is one of our missions. We engage in activities other than work, exploring the Malagasy nature and enjoying it.

title: Career and Entrepreneurship Forum
content: AKATA GOAVANA was a partner in the EMPLOYMENT AND ENTREPRENEURSHIP FORUM event organized by the NGO Ndao Hifanosika Fianara on November 19-20, 2021, in Fianarantsoa. During this event, we presented our company, assisted, and encouraged young people to contribute to the development of our region, Haute Matsiatra.
